content: This is ready for review. There are a few more results I haven't proved because of API disparity between affine and convex stuff, but they are very much not needed yet.
The proof of affine_independent.convex_independent being almost done, I left it in comments. Is that fine?
I left a comment about the comment. :-) I think you need more "text comments" if you want to leave in place "code comments".
It'll get problematic with the next step of the convexity refactor.
I took out the commented out code, and hit merge. It can be restored in a later PR, perhaps.
Thanks! Actually, Oliver is adding part of the glue in #9103 so that should be quick.
